strongs_def: to complete, in a good or a bad sense, literal, or figurative, transitive or intransitive
kjv_def: accomplish, cease, be clean (pass-) ed, consume, have done, (come to an, have an, make an) end, fail, come to the full, be all gone, [idiom] be all here, be (make) perfect, be spent, sum, be (shew self) upright, be wasted, whole.
